name: Boy Hurdler
description:
THE CHALLENGE:
Help Boy Hurdler to clear as many hurdles as possible on the track, during the play.

BoyHurdler™ is an intuitive, smooth, and addictive leisure game activity. This application, designed for the iphone and ipad, challenges your ability to keep the boy hurdler on the track as long as possible, during the play. Your mission is to ensure the boy hurdler avoids crashing into the oncoming hurdles, by clearing each one cleanly on each jump.

The game accumulates the amount of seconds the boy jumper stays on the track before crashing into the hurdle. The game also accumulates the amount of hurdles cleared by the boy hurdler. The game also saves the highest amount of hurdles cleared each event and challenges the player to beat the previous highest count.

The game ends when the boy hurdler crashes into the hurdle. A performance summary page is then presented to the player with the following:
• The amount of time spent on the tracks
• The amount of hurdles cleared by the boy hurdler
• The highest amount of hurdles cleared during each track event.

FEATURES:
- The application displays a running boy hurdler with an animated background
- An intuitive activity, easy to understand and play, but hard to resist
- Your jumped hurdle score is updated every time the boy clears a hurdle
- The elapsed time is updated every second, while the boy clears the hurdles
- Each game offers intrigue, fun, challenge, and excitement for the player
- No need to rush the activity. The game does not depend on time or speed
- A relaxing and exciting pastime; perfect for your leisure game entertainment

SIMPLE INSTRUCTIONS:
The game scene appears with an animated runner and background scene
1 - Touch the Start Sport button to start the activity
- The Jump Hurdle button moves to the center below
- The hurdles start moving toward the hurdler
2 - Touch the Jump Hurdle button to clear each hurdle.
3 – Continue touching the Jump Hurdle button to clear as many hurdles, as possible
- If the boy hurdler crashes into the hurdle, the game stops
4 - The Summary page appears immediately at the end of the game with the scores displayed
5 – Touch the “Play Another Game” button to play again.

This game presents a unique and exciting leisure experience.
